div.data-react-data-bundle: {"notifications":[{"id":7305,"message":"Due to COVID-19, Governor Northam orders ALL Virginia K-12 schools to be closed for the rest of the academic year. \r\n\r\nBuchanan County Public Schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 academic year.","type":"overlay"}]}
